entry.title: BIP 100 repo
entry.summary: On September 2nd, 2015, Jeff Garzik opened a repository containing the full text of BIP 100 discussion document in markdown format. The purpose of this repository was to check the BIP 100 formal specification before submitting it to upstream bips.git repo. The link to the repository provided in the context is https://github.com/jgarzik/bip100.
